description:
Kiba, Shino and Hinata have come up with an idea to use the Bikochu beetle to find Sasuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou Tsuibi Chikara ni Akamaru mo Shitto! Maboroshi no Bikou Mushi o Sagase
Even Akamaru Is Jealous of His Searching Ability! Search for the Phantom Bikouchuu!
À la recherche des insecteurs flaireurs
แกะรอยเก่งจนอากามารุยังอิจฉา
超追尾力に赤丸も嫉妬! 幻の微香虫を探せ
